sense.gloss: to pay no attention to (while listening), to take no notice of, to ignore, to let go in one ear and out the other

sdata.j: 「↑見↑↓み↓て↑見↑↓み↓て！ ↑聞↑↓|き↓き↑流↑↓なが↓す|だけで↑1↑↓いっ↓↑週間↑↓しゅうかん↓で↑英語↑↓えいご↓がペラペラになる↑C↑↓シー↓↑D↑↓ディー↓だって」「↑馬鹿↑↓ばか↓、そんなもん↑誇大↑↓こだい↓↑広告↑↓こうこく↓に↑決↑↓き↓まってんだろ」
sdata.e: Hey, look at this! Apparently, if you just put this CD on in the background for a week, you'll become fluent in English! "Don't be stupid. That's just exaggerated advertising."
